thread.title: Robin Johnson

author: Robin Johnson
title: Robin Johnson
text: I understand unexpected or differences may occur. I.believe that's the times when you can really tell the truth about who or how a person is. How they respond to and handle that situation exspecially when its unfavorable or different from their stance. Well Mitch hes a true honset and professional person for sure who will do RIGHT by people. Thats outstanding service to me. Thanks
